name: GesCommLab
short_description:
This tool aims to help scientific laboratories in centralizing the orders and facilitate the monitoring of purchases and delivery orders. It was created in a way to ease access to everyone and to minimize the needs in supports.
This tools is made of tabs that give access to the functionnalities : 

- View / Create / order product for someone. Prices and units control
- View and completion of the orders that are pending purchase or delivery documents
- History of orders
- Statistics
- People management

This tool is developed in PHP / Javascript  / MySQL.
MVC pattern for development.
JQuery and JQuery-UI as javascript framework
HighCharts for graphics http://www.highcharts.com/ 

Licence : 
HighCharts is under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 License.
JQuery is under MIT Licence
the rest of the code is under MIT Licence
summary: Management tool of orders for laboratories
